name: The internet flower garden
description:
This is my second game jam! First LD! I tried hard to make this game, and hope you at least try to enjoy! As more of a beginner I learned something, Keep the crunching to a minimum!

Right click to interact!
Escape to return to the menu!

Credit to Bosca Ceoil,
Scratch (where I made the art, Disappointing.),
Audacity,
blender,
and the Unity game engine!
